title: [Feat]: Disable downloads for minimal system
body:
### Describe the feature

Disable downloads

### Motivation

I am creating a ThinClient OS and I want to allow Teams, would it be possible to disable certain features so the filemanager is nog accessed, it would be nice if none of the external applications can be opened from the user?

### Alternatives

Chromium Webapp, but that is not better.

### Additional context

_No response_
